examples.chinese: 最高紀錄曾經連續加班工作36小時，時薪連一百元都不到，還差點變成爆肝族，
examples.translation: My record was working 36 hours of overtime in a row, with hourly pay not even reaching 100 yuan, and I almost became one of the overworked.

examples.chinese: 我拒絕成為下一個「爆肝族 」！
examples.translation: I refuse to become the next overworked casualty!
The IT industry has many overworked people.
